items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Mini-Daraja is a lightweight Node.js library for seamless integration with the Safaricom Daraja API. It simplifies handling M-Pesa operations like STK Push, B2C, C2B, transaction status, and balance inquiries, with modern ES6 module support and robust error handling.
items.title: DeveloperWilliams/mini-Daraja-Api: Mini-Daraja is a lightweight Node.js library for seamless integration with the Safaricom Daraja API. It simplifies handling M-Pesa operations like STK Push, B2C, C2B, transaction status, and balance inquiries, with modern ES6 module support and robust error handling.
